channel.title: Teleporting Buttons [PI]
channel.description:
How do you change the teleporting buttons to make them light up all the time? I've tried changing them through Tom's Cache Suite, but the cache is too big.
To make them look like this. Not in this specific order, but just make them light up with no runes in your inventory, and the same with ancients too. [IMG]http://i1214.photobucket.com/albums/cc492/3lv3nsnip3r/updatedmagetab.jpg[/img]

item.title: Teleporting Buttons [PI]
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

How do you change the teleporting buttons to make them light up all the time? I’ve tried changing them through Tom’s Cache Suite, but the cache is too big.

To make them look like this. Not in this specific order, but just make them light up with no runes in your inventory, and the same with ancients too.
